meta.description: Optimize the number of original and experimental meals to minimize cooking time while adhering to waste constraints.

sets.name: MEALS
sets.description: Types of meal combos available at the restaurant.

params.name: food_waste
params.description: Units of food waste generated by each meal type.

params.name: wrapping_waste
params.description: Units of wrapping waste generated by each meal type.

params.name: cooking_time
params.description: Minutes required to cook each meal type.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each meal type to be prepared.

objective.name: min_total_cooking_time
objective.expr: sum(cooking_time[m] * x[m] for m in MEALS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cooking time for all meals.

constraints.name: wrapping_waste_limit
constraints.description: Total wrapping waste must not exceed 900 units.

constraints.name: food_waste_limit
constraints.description: Total food waste must not exceed 800 units.
